api_key_management_subtitle: Manage your API key securely for access to WpscalerPro services.
api_key_desc: Required to access WpscalerPro's cloud services.
create_api_key_here: You can create your key here.
api_key_security: Do not share your key. Use it only on this site.
api_key_save_error: Error: API key could not be saved.
api_key_remove_error: Error: API key could not be deleted.
